data.what_is: One cloud-based software to modernize and manage your entire dental practice. Centralize communication, streamline your front desk operations and boost your team's efficiency. Acquire more new patients and give them a personalized experience they'll keep coming back for. Re-activate those patients sitting dormant in your PMS and get them back to your chair. Adit tracks all of your practice activities and transforms that raw data into bite-sized metrics you can use to make informed decisions, discover untapped revenue opportunities and develop new strategies with surgical precision.
data.product_description: Adit is a full-service digital marketing firm that provides turn-key solutions to businesses looking to gain more qualified leads, build brand recognition, and prosper financially.

pricing_plans.plan_description:
2% less expensive
than the avg. SEO Services product
Read Small-Business Reviews https://www.g2.com/products/adit/reviews?filters%5Bcompany_segment%5D%5B%5D=179

initial_reviews.review_title: Easy to use tools that make my days run smoothly
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Adit?
It is easy to use and figure out. I was able to teach myself to create my own customized new patient forms within a few tries. I also always have the option to send the content that I need made into a form to Adit and they will make it for me.

What do you dislike about Adit?
The only downside was how long the process took to get the system up and running. The onboarding process was kind of long, but ended up being worth it for sure!

Recommendations to others considering Adit:
You need to be willing to spend the time to really learn the software and take advantage of all of its features. Even if just one person is using all of the features in the office, it benefits everybody. It is so comprehensive that it can seem overwhelming and like a lot to learn, but it is a tool and used correctly, can really help the practice.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
Adit has several features that help me daily. My favorites are the Follow Ups function on Practice Analytics and the Patient Forms. I am able to do all of our new patient paperwork digitally and have reminders automatically sent for me. Not only do I save a lot of paper, but a lot of time by having Adit get the forms filled out for me. The follow ups function keeps sticky notes off of my desk. I am able to put any reminders I need into the follow up function for any team member and assign a date. Everbody checks their follow ups daily so they can see what reminders are in there.

initial_reviews.review_title: The Adit platform is user friendly and easy to understand.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Adit?
The app makes after hours communications simple.

What do you dislike about Adit?
Always cost is a factor. Its pretty much hands off with the customer service, we just haven't needed help.

Recommendations to others considering Adit:
Great for the dental field.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to do email campaigns and converse with patients easily after hours with messaging on the Adit app.

What do you like best about Adit?
Ease of use and settings. Attentive staff that when they could not reach me, continued to try to fix the issue.

What do you dislike about Adit?
Sometimes we have issues with our phones and are unaware of them. This is most likely an issue with our internet service.

Recommendations to others considering Adit:
Very good customer service and helpful staff.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had issues with connecting our Google Page to our Adit service. Paul was a joy to work with and made it easy to fix this issue.

What do you like best about Adit?
Seamless software integration with practice management.

What do you dislike about Adit?
SEO dashboard for practices is missing feature

Recommendations to others considering Adit:
Give it a try, you wont regret.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
Attracting more customers

What do you like best about Adit?
The customer service is great. Our account manager is fantastic, and the rest of our team is responsive and competent.

What do you dislike about Adit?
I can't think of anything in particular!

Recommendations to others considering Adit:
Do it!

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helps keep all of our offices in one place. Easy to see how our offices are performing and have a pulse on their overall health. We can track and make decisions based on data.

What do you like best about Adit?
User-friendly platform with features that are easy to deploy.

What do you dislike about Adit?
The platform isn't yet fully integrated with our scheduling software, precluding us from effectively using select features.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
Adit allows us to have a greater digital footprint and manage our patients in a seamless and efficient manner.

What do you like best about Adit?
The platform is user-friendly for both patients and employees. The website is easy to navigate. All information is provided at the click of a few buttons.

What do you dislike about Adit?
The mass texting portion could have more options.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
Patient appointments, confirmations and recare reminders for our dental practice.

What do you like best about Adit?
The best about Adit is their texting communication feautures.

What do you dislike about Adit?
I wish it was integrated fully with Open Dental and that texting would show in the patients accounts.

Recommendations to others considering Adit:
Adit makes job easier

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
I like their new feature of practice analytic.

Describe the project or task Adit helped with:
Adit has helped design a new website to assist in organic growth as well as pay-per-click and social media posts.  Record incoming calls to coach our team on why they may not have converted the patient and track missed calls have been very helpful in going our new patients!

What do you like best about Adit?
The call tracking and coaching have been very helpful in building our team's skills and pointing out where we were failing.  It all starts and stops with the first impression of the phone call so this has been very helpful!

What do you dislike about Adit?
not having all the phone's capabilities and features as our current phone company Weave has.  I'm hopeful they will have them all soon so we can get rid of that extra expense that we have with Weave.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
Def the phones and how the front desk staff is handling the phones and long on-hold wait times and missed calls, we had no idea that this was happening!!  So thank you Adit.

Describe the project or task Adit helped with:
We used Adit to build our website. Now we use it for social media marketing, SEO and advertising, patient communication (appointment reminders, digital forms, phone system, review requests, and more.

What do you like best about Adit?
I love that Adit is one-stop software for everything we need to effectively communicate with patients. Additionally, it's easy to do marketing with adit.

What do you dislike about Adit?
Some features are rough around the edges when they first come out, but they get improved quickly.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
social media marketing, SEO and advertising, patient communication (appointment reminders, digital forms, phone system, review requests, and more.

Describe the project or task Adit helped with:
Tech support and marketing- love their supportive services such as appointment reminders.  Tech service top notch and saves us 500 a month in auxiliary services.

What do you like best about Adit?
Marketing is very helpful as well as the tech support.  They also always respond right away to any requests.  They are constantly evolving and updating their services.

What do you dislike about Adit?
I really don't find any downsides.  They have such a vast array of services.  Maybe the only improvement could be social media support however it is difficult because Instagram is so personal.

Recommendations to others considering Adit:
Use them from the beginning!

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
They provide complete marketing package as well as all of our third party software needs.  They even have a phone system.  They helped me achieve google reviews.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent marketing extension of my offfice
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Adit helped with:
Adit has been an integral part of my marketing team for my startup office since before I even opened. With their guidance and input, I have been able to build my practice exponentially. They are readily available for any technical issues if we run into any and always have suggestions for my marketing campaigns! A great office has a great team behind it and Adit has been an essential part of it!

What do you like best about Adit?
Patient engagement, adit app/platform. reminders, patient forms

What do you dislike about Adit?
I have had a few changes in the manager for my account. There were some fallbacks a month or two over the year and a half I have been with them but it has been addressed

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
Missed calls

Describe the project or task Adit helped with:
Website design
Digital Marketing/SEO
Obtaining new patients
Have a solid online  presence

What do you like best about Adit?
Adit has been there since the start of our dental office and has simplified our lives. Aside from great marketing strategies they have automated many tasks that would take at least 2 employees to run.  Their ease of use and customer service has been paramount. Would highly recommend for start up or existing dental practice!

What do you dislike about Adit?
Nothing at the moment. They have been very helpful in answering any questions regarding marketing and helping bring new patients through the door.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
Marketing/SEO
Call tracking
Text messages/ Google reviews
Digital marketing

Describe the project or task Adit helped with:
Adit goes above and beyond to help our office communicate with our patients from online appointments, appointment reminders, accessible texting communication, online paperwork, and so much more!

What do you like best about Adit?
Our favorite feature is the recare texts adit automatically sends out when a patient is due for their six months cleaning!

What do you dislike about Adit?
It will text a patient everytime we move their appointment

Recommendations to others considering Adit:
Always reach out to support for help!

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
Nothing

initial_reviews.review_title: ADIT has simply made my life easier.
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Adit helped with:
They helped my company to be more visible to search engines.  That helped tremendously to attract patient and grow the practice.

What do you like best about Adit?
technological features offered by ADIT makes it above and beyond what I expected.  We love being able to text patients.  Patients make online appointment and we instantly receive an e mail, and much much more.

What do you dislike about Adit?
I can't think of any.  ADIT and its advance thec features are more than we can ask for.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
More traffic to our website. More patient call and set appointments.  Growth of our practice.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very Helpful! a must use in my everyday work life, I highly recommend because it's so easy to use!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Adit helped with:
My patients can connect with me quickly that is easier for them, and even schedule appointments too.

What do you like best about Adit?
How easy and helpful it use all the features.

What do you dislike about Adit?
Nothing I dislike, everything that I have experienced is great!

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
quickly resolving any issues, patients have with either time and date for their appointments.

Describe the project or task Adit helped with:
THey have helped me manage my website and all the changes that frequently occur as well as help us track and grow our SEO.

What do you like best about Adit?
Their prompt attention to our inquires and ease of communication.

What do you dislike about Adit?

Recommendations to others considering Adit:
If you are wanting a partnership in managing your website, SEO and marketing, you should use them.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are working to hone in on niches that we will be offering in the near future.

What do you like best about Adit?
Ease of use. Helpful. Helps communicate with your patients.  Confirming appointments via text messages.

What do you dislike about Adit?
Nothing. Sometimes they return calls later than 24 hours.

What problems is Adit solving and how is that benefiting you?
Confirmation of patients appointments.  Recaro reminders for continuing care.
